items.name: Draining Rake
items.target: One creature or object per minion

effects.tier1: 4 cold damage; the wraith can shift 1 square
effects.tier2: 7 cold damage; the wraith shifts up to 2 square
effects.tier3: 9 cold damage; P<5 slowed (save ends); the wraith shifts up to 3 squares

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The wraith turns invisible until the start of their next turn.

The wraith can move through creatures and objects at their usual speed, but can't end their turn inside a creature or object. The first time in a round that the wraith moves through a creature, that creature takes 5 corruption damage. The wraith doesn't take damage from being force moved into objects.
